p: Biradar and coworkers investigated the in vivo antiarthritic potential of the EOs from two Cyperus species (Cyperaceae) from India, C. esculenthus L. and C. rotondus L. [ 33]. Samples were tested using the formaldehyde-induced arthritis model in Wistar albino rats. EOs were administered at the dose of 500 mg/Kg, and after 10 days of treatment they were able to inhibit paw edema by 75.54% ( C. rotondus) and 76.58% ( C. esculenthus).
